preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 2.5 g of Cadmium Oxide. 
 2. Weigh out 2.5 g of Chromium Oxide. 
 3. Weigh out 2.5 g of Iron Oxide. 
 4. Weigh out 10 g of Phosphorus Pentoxide. 
 5. Mix all powders in a clean, dry container using a spatula until a uniform color is achieved.
